item.description:
Hi Folks,

It's winter lets warm up on the inside with some wonderful Thai food. I recently ate here with my son & I was so pleased with the quality of the ingredients and the owner/ chef that was so warm & welcoming, he will design a dish around your taste, so cool. So, if you like your food with no spice or plenty of it, you will get your desire. All the dishes are under $14.00 for dinner and lunch around $8.00.  He is willing to close off the restaurant for us. WOW! Thaitimepascoag.com 567-7600. Web is under construction.

If the weather is right I might also schedule a hike before this.

See you soon!
item.name: Thai Food
